name: removeCategoryFromChannel
shortDescription: Removes a category from a channel
description: This method removes a category from a channel.
signatures: Boolean removeCategoryFromChannel(Integer peerId, Integer channel, Integer categoryId)

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer to remove the category from.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel of the peer to remove the category from.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The ID of the category as returned by createCategory() or getCategories().

returnValue: Returns true on success and false if something went wrong (e. g. unknown channel).
